p: Then, in New York, Detroit, and some other areas many people started to die and hospitals became heavily burdened. The media’s intense focus on the pandemic has forced most of the population to retreat into their homes, regardless of their plans and the recommendations in place. As a result, jobs began to vanish at an extraordinary pace. The number of unemployed people in the United States has increased at a rate likely not seen since the “Great Depression” that began in late 1929, and it may now surpass it. Thus, in the USA, tens of thousands of people will die in the initial wave of this epidemic, and the economy will also receive a major blow [ 16, 17].
